Package jackstockley.addressbookcli

Class FrontendHelper

java.lang.Object
jackstockley.addressbookcli.FrontendHelper
public class FrontendHelper
extends java.lang.Object
This part of the program helps with random tasks to make the program function Part of the functions are logging and allowing for any data or time searching on the database
Version:
2.6
Author:
jnstockley

    • dirFixer

      public java.lang.String dirFixer​(java.lang.String dir)
      Makes sure the directory when saving files is valid and doesn't include the bin folder or AddressBook.jar
      Parameters:
      dir - The current directory of the jar file
      Returns:
      The fixed directory not including AddressBook.jar or the bin folder

    • dateFinder

      public java.lang.String dateFinder​(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Uses regular expression to allow a user to find address, occupations, and people based on if they were created within a certain year, month, or day
      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
      Returns:
      A string that can be read by MySQL to find data from a certain year, month, or day

    • timeFinder

      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
